Package org.javabot.channel

Class ChannelManager

java.lang.Object
org.javabot.channel.ChannelManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyObserver
public class ChannelManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements MyObserver
Provides channel management functionality.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected static java.lang.String joinRatio
    The ratio which restricts the allowed number of joiners per timeframe.

    • notifyEvent

      public void notifyEvent​(int event)
      Observer method allowing a TimerTask object to trigger events for ChannelManager to respond to.
      Specified by:
      notifyEvent in interface MyObserver
      Parameters:
      event - Event type as defined in org.javabot.util.MyObserver.

    • notifyEvent

      public void notifyEvent​(int event, int type, java.lang.String message)
      Observer method allowing a TimerTask object to trigger events for ChannelManager to respond to.
      Specified by:
      notifyEvent in interface MyObserver
      Parameters:
      event - Event to respond to as defined in org.javabot.util.MyObserver. Usually used to notify floods and hence accompanied by the flood type and the hostmask of the flooder.
      type - The type of flood being notified as defined in org.javabot.security.FloodCounter.
      message - Usually the hostmask of the user causing the flood.

    • notifyEvent

      public void notifyEvent​(int event, int type)
      An unused event notifier, required to satisfy the requirements of the MyObserver interface.
      Specified by:
      notifyEvent in interface MyObserver
      Parameters:
      event - Event.
      type - Event type.
